J'ai fait un saut au Buck and Ear Pub and Grill à Richmond, C.-B. Gens agréables, conversation formidable : Richmond est prêt pour la vague bleue!pic.twitter.com/FD4Oj7065q

Une cour de la C-B déclare que la province ne peut restreindre la circulation du pétrole parce que les pipelines interprovinciaux sont une **compétence exclusive** d’Ottawa. Exactement comme j’ai toujours dit. Vous avez lu ça @francoislegault?https://www.ctvnews.ca/business/court-rules-b-c-can-t-limit-oil-shipments-in-major-blow-for-pipeline-fight-1.4435477 …

Court says B.C. can't restrict oil shipments because that would interfere with the federal government's **exclusive jurisdiction** over interprovincial pipelines. Just as I said. Did you read this @francoislegault? https://www.ctvnews.ca/business/court-rules-b-c-can-t-limit-oil-shipments-in-major-blow-for-pipeline-fight-1.4435477 …

Scheer in 2018: “Running such huge deficits and putting this country further and further into debt is endangering future generations.” Scheer in 2019: The Liberals made me do it.https://www.kelownanow.com/watercooler/news/news/Penticton/Scheer_blasts_Liberals_for_huge_deficits_and_attacking_small_business/ …

Scheer in 2017: “I think it's very important to have an ambitious timeline to return this country back to balanced budgets. Because every year that we're in deficit, we're borrowing money from my children and spending it today." Scheer in 2019: The Liberals made me do it.https://twitter.com/CBCPolitics/status/1132196615668809729 …

Scheer in 2017: “A lot of people think that a two-year target for a balanced budget is too aggressive. That it can't be done. I reject that." Scheer in 2019: The Liberals made me do it.https://www.cbc.ca/news/politics/scheer-trudeau-deficit-election-1.5148248?__vfz=medium%3Dsharebar …

Kenny Chiu has an amazing team in Steveston-Richmond East! It was a privilege to visit them tonight to talk about how a new Conservative government will help Canadians in Richmond get ahead. Keep up the great work, @RmdKenny! #cdnpolipic.twitter.com/xcwIPYDpnv

Kenny Chiu a une équipe formidable dans Steveston-Richmond Est! C’était un privilège de les rencontrer ce soir pour dire comment un nouveau gouvernement conservateur aidera les Canadiens de Richmond à améliorer leur quotidien. Continuez comme ça @RmdKenny! #polcanpic.twitter.com/hgkabXfxYG

Éliminer un tas de dépenses injustifiées des libéraux ne prend pas plus de temps qu’en éliminer un peu. Ça prend toutefois peut-être plus de détermination et de courage politique. Et ça, vous ne l’avez pas.https://twitter.com/AndrewScheer/status/1131921155076558848 …

Cutting a lot of unjustified Liberal spending doesn’t take longer than cutting a little bit. It may take more determination and political courage though. You just don’t have it.https://twitter.com/AndrewScheer/status/1131923235002626053 …
